https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/SDbTy4IzTFnxvGycW7cePjEDDP.jpg Behind the Movement is a unique and fast-paced retelling of how Rosa Parks' refusal to give up her seat launched the history-making Montgomery Bus Boycott. Behind the Movement
